gVL Staff Jul  

The W.K PERIOD Kellogg Foundation announced a total of  teaching fellows at a recent press conference and said that  of the fellows will be attending GVSU PERIOD Each teaching fellow must teach for three years at a prepicked state school while also completely a masters degree program at GVSU and will receive a  stipend intended to help with the completion of a masters degree PERIOD The schools which the fellows must teach at will be picked from within the Grand Rapids Public Schools GodfreyLee Public Schools and Muskegon Public Schools PERIOD
